quiz.task: Identify which ONE of the following correctly identifies the error in the following requirement statement:
quiz.claim: "When the Input_Valve is connected to a Water_Source, the Inlet_Valve shall be opened by the Control_Subsystem."

explanation.summary: There is one error: The sentence is in the passive voice.
details: The statement should be re-written to be:
$QUOTE
"When the Input_Valve is connected to a Water_Source, the Control_Subsystem shall open the Inlet_Valve."

alternatives.alternative: One error: use of superfluous words
One error: incorrect use of the same term to mean the same thing
One error: sentence in passive voice
One error: use of vague words
One error: incorrect use of the definite article

quiz.task: Identify which ONE of the following correctly identifies the error in the following requirement statement:
quiz.claim: "When in the ACTIVE State, the Record_Subsystem shall display the Line_Item_Name, without obscuring a User_ID."

explanation.summary: There is one error: incorrect use of the definite article—"the" must be use since-"a" is tantamount to "any of".
details: The statement should be re-written to be:
$QUOTE
"When in the ACTIVE State, the Record_Subsystem shall display the Line_Item_Name, without obscuring the User_ID."
